name: edehr
title: Ed EHR
description: This project provides an educational tool that replicates an Electronic Health Record system within a Learning Tools Interoperability (LTI) compliant course-ware.

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install: npm run install:client && npm run install:server && npm run install:maker
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.run: echo 'cd to deployment and use package scripts'
scripts.start:prod: npm run stop:prod && npm run build && cd deployment && npm run prod:build
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.update:prod: git pull && npm run build && npm run restart:prod

scriptsComments.*db: for dev only. start and stop a bare bones mongo
scriptsComments.run: for dev and prod cd into the deployment directory and run scripts
scriptsComments.install: MUST run this on newly clone repo or to update packages
scriptsComments.shell:*: open a sh shell on the choosen running container. Good to see the inside
scriptsComments.*:full:*: Ditto but first build the static client side.
